electrostatic-added

structure of electrostatic spraying

As this electrostatic spraying system is able to load the static electricity on the ultra fine particles of the conventional Arimitsu normal temperature fog machine LVH series and an adhesion rate to the back of leaves increases. Superior pest control effect is provided.

By Particles pass through the Ring-shaped electrode which electrified to 290V, particles charged with negative electric charg

electrostatic addition mechanism by the induction charging method

In the usual case, the positive electric charge and the negative charge in a plant are distributed uniformly each. When the negative charge particles approach, the positive charge moves to the surface and the positive charge and the negative charge pull against each other.

electrostatic test in the greenhouse
